description: Implement the 'Fresh Coral' design system across the Voltikka Laravel application. This includes updating fonts, colors, typography, spacing, and component patterns to match the design-system/ specifications.

tasks.title: Update base layout with Plus Jakarta Sans font and design tokens
tasks.description: Update laravel/resources/views/layouts/app.blade.php to: 1) Replace Roboto with Plus Jakarta Sans from Google Fonts (weights: 400, 500, 600, 700, 800), 2) Update Tailwind config to use the new coral and slate color palettes as defined in design-system/tokens.json, 3) Add CSS custom properties from design-system/tokens.css for semantic colors. Reference the design-system/README.md for color values.

tasks.title: Restyle header with new navigation patterns
tasks.description: Update the header in laravel/resources/views/layouts/app.blade.php to use the new design system: 1) Use slate-900 for primary text, 2) Update nav links to use the nav-link pattern from components.md (slate-500 default, slate-900 hover, slate-100 background on active), 3) Add the spot price indicator styling if applicable. Use 64px (4rem) header height.

tasks.title: Implement dark hero section with coral accents
tasks.description: Update the hero section in laravel/resources/views/livewire/contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Use slate-950 (#0f1419) background for hero, 2) Apply hero-headline typography (60px, 800 weight, coral-400 accent for highlighted word), 3) Add glassmorphism stat cards (bg-white/5, backdrop-blur-sm) if stats are shown, 4) Update badges to use coral-50 background. Reference typography.md and colors.md.

tasks.title: Restyle consumption selector cards with coral active states
tasks.description: Update the consumption/preset selection cards in contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Use white background with slate-200 border (2px), 2) On hover: coral-400 border, 3) Active state: coral gradient background (from-coral-500 to-coral-600), white text, coral shadow (shadow-coral), 4) Use 16px border-radius. Follow the consumption selector pattern in components.md.

tasks.title: Implement new filter pill styling
tasks.description: Update filter buttons in contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Default: slate-50 bg, slate-200 border, slate-600 text, 8px radius, 2) Hover: slate-300 border, 3) Active: slate-950 bg, slate-950 border, white text. Remove the current success-500 green styling for active state. Follow filter-btn pattern in components.md.

tasks.title: Implement ranked contract cards with emissions-based left border
tasks.description: Completely restyle the contract cards in contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Add rank number (01, 02, etc.) with extrabold weight in slate-200 (coral-500 for featured/rank 1), 2) Add 4px left border colored by emissions (green/amber/red) or 6px coral gradient for featured, 3) Use 24px padding, 24px border-radius, white background, slate-100 border, 4) Card hover: translateY(-2px) with shadow-card-hover, 5) Style price display: 24px/800 weight for main price, coral-600 for featured price, slate-400 for unit label. Reference components.md contract card section.

tasks.title: Update energy source and status badges
tasks.description: Restyle badges in contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Green badges (Tuuli, Vesivoima, etc.): #dcfce7 background, #15803d text, 8px radius, 12px font, 700 weight, uppercase, 2) Neutral badges: slate-100 bg, slate-600 text, 3) Remove current green-700 border styling. Follow badge patterns in components.md.

tasks.title: Implement coral CTA buttons with gradient and shadow
tasks.description: Restyle all primary CTA buttons (Katso lisää, Vertaa sähkösopimuksia, etc.): 1) Primary: coral gradient (from-coral-500 to-coral-600), white text, 700 weight, 12px radius, coral shadow (shadow-coral), 2) Hover: lighter gradient (from-coral-400 to-coral-500), 3) Secondary: slate-900 bg, white text. Remove current cyan/primary button styling. Follow button patterns in components.md.

tasks.title: Restyle footer with dark slate background
tasks.description: Update footer in layouts/app.blade.php: 1) Use slate-950 background, 2) White/slate-300 text colors, 3) Add coral-400 for accent links, 4) Use 64px vertical padding. Match the hero dark section styling from colors.md.

tasks.title: Restyle the calculator tab with coral accents
tasks.description: Update the calculator section in contracts-list.blade.php: 1) Replace cyan-500/600 with coral-500/600 for all interactive elements (inputs, toggles, selected states), 2) Update result display to use coral-600 text for the calculated value, 3) Use coral-50 for highlight backgrounds instead of cyan-50, 4) Update the CTA button to use coral gradient. Reference the consumption selector pattern.
